options.optionText: What’s going on? You look serious.
options.responseText: I’m knocked up. And it’s yours. You pumped me full so hard the vault med-bot flagged me as compromised. Your dick apparently works a little too well. You put a baby in me and... for once I don’t feel like running from it. Or from you.

followUpOptions.optionText: You sure it's mine? I'm not the only guy in this vault, you know...
followUpOptions.responseText: It’s yours. I haven’t exactly been passing myself around, okay? You were the only one I let wreck me raw.

I get it. I wouldn’t have believed me either. But it’s real. I feel it every damn second—my body’s changing, my head’s a mess... and I keep thinking about you. About us. You think I'd lie about growing a whole human in me just to screw with you? You wanna see the med-scan, or maybe just the tits that don't fit in my damn suit anymore?

followUpOptions.optionText: So what now? You move in? We raise the kid?
followUpOptions.responseText: Honestly... part of me wants that, yes. But there's a problem. The purity police know—I’ve been flagged. They’re talking about exiling me unless you convince them otherwise.

followUpOptions.optionText: Are you sure you want this? It could mean trouble for both of us.
followUpOptions.responseText: I didn’t plan on becoming the vault’s knocked-up scandal, and I’m scared, yeah—but I want to fight for this. For us. But only if you do too.

followUpOptions.optionText: Don't worry. I'll deal with them.
followUpOptions.responseText: You will? God… thank you. I don't know what I'd do without you. Just… don't back down, okay? Show them we're serious. Otherwise, I'm gone, and this kid—our kid—might never know you.

followUpOptions.optionText: If this is happening... I’m with you. All the way.
followUpOptions.responseText: Really? You mean that? Shit... don’t make me cry. These hormones are already wrecking me. But yeah—I want this. With you. ♥

followUpOptions.optionText: We'll figure this out. Together. I promise.
followUpOptions.responseText: Yeah. Together. Damn... I never thought I’d say this, but I’m glad it was you.

followUpOptions.optionText: I feel the same way, Diana... I didn’t expect this either, but I want it. I want *you.*
followUpOptions.responseText: ...God. Say that again. I swear, I thought I’d never hear anything like that meant for me. You actually mean it?

followUpOptions.optionText: I love you, Diana. I think I have for a while now.
followUpOptions.responseText: Wait—what? You can't just... fuck. I... shit. I wasn't ready to hear that. My head's a mess, my heart’s racing, and I don’t even know what I’m supposed to say.
Yeah... maybe? Fuck. I didn't expect to feel like this. You just threw me a curveball, and now I’m drowning in feelings I didn't even know I had.

followUpOptions.optionText: Just tell me the truth—how do you really feel?
followUpOptions.responseText: The truth? It terrifies me. Because I think... no, I *know* I'm in love with you too. It feels reckless and stupid, but goddammit, I can’t stop it.

followUpOptions.optionText: Is that really you talking, or just the hormones?
followUpOptions.responseText: I wish it were that simple. These feelings were here long before you knocked me up. The hormones just made hiding them impossible.

followUpOptions.optionText: Diana, we’ll make this work. I promise.
followUpOptions.responseText: I believe you. And honestly, right now that scares me more than anything. But it's good. Maybe scary means it’s real.
*soft gasp* ...God, I've wanted that. For so long. *slurp*
*leans into you* ...You don’t have to say anything. I already know. Just don’t let go.
*eyes well up* ...Then stay. Just like this. For as long as you can.

followUpOptions.optionText: We'll convince the purity police. You're staying right here.
followUpOptions.responseText: You better. Because if I lose you, I lose everything. And that's not an option.

followUpOptions.optionText: So... what do you want from me?
followUpOptions.responseText: I don’t know. Support? Presence? A sign that I’m not completely insane for thinking we could be something together? I’m not asking you to be perfect—not as a father, or anything else. Just be real with me.

followUpOptions.optionText: This isn’t my problem. I never signed up for this.
followUpOptions.responseText: *tears up, voice cracking* ...Right. Of course you didn’t. Stupid me, thinking you might actually give a damn. Forget I said anything. Forget *me.*

options.responseText: Go if you need to. But please... come back. This isn’t something I want to face alone. Not anymore.

auto_lines: There you are. We need to talk. And before you say anything—just listen, okay?
